43 #include "include/tapi_lib/serviceclient.hpp"

45 using namespace std;

47 namespace Tapi

49 // Constructor/Destructor
50 
51 ServiceClient::ServiceClient(ros::NodeHandle* nh, string nodename)
52  : TapiClient(nh, nodename, SERVICE_CLIENT), nh(nh), nodename(nodename)
53 {
54  configSub = nh->subscribe("/Tapi/Config", 1000, &ServiceClient::readConfigMsg, this);
55 }
56 
57 ServiceClient::~ServiceClient()
58 {
59  configSub.shutdown();
60  for (int i = 0; i < clients.size(); i++)
61  {
62  clients[i].second->shutdown();
63  delete clients[i].second;
64  clients[i].second = 0;
65  }
66 }
67 
68 // Private member functions
69 void ServiceClient::readConfigMsg(const tapi_lib::Connection::ConstPtr& msg)
70 {
71  // Iterate through all of our features to check if this Config message contains a uuid of us
72  for (int i = 0; i < featureMsgs.size(); i++)
73  {
74  if (msg->SubscriberUUID == uuid && msg->SubscriberFeatureUUID == featureMsgs[i].UUID)
75  {
76  // Message is for us. Now check if we shall disconnect
77  if (msg->PublisherUUID == "0" || msg->PublisherFeatureUUID == "0")
78  if (clients[i].second)
79  {
80  clients[i].second->shutdown();
81  delete clients[i].second;
82  clients[i].second = 0;
83  }
84  else
85  ;
86  // Or we shall connect
87  else
88  {
89  // Check if there currently is a connection and if it's the same as we shall connect. Because only if we change
90  // the connection we need to stop the old service and start/create the new one
91  if (serviceName[i] != "/Tapi/" + msg->PublisherUUID + "/" + msg->PublisherFeatureUUID || clients[i].second == 0)
92  {
93  serviceName[i] = "/Tapi/" + msg->PublisherUUID + "/" + msg->PublisherFeatureUUID;
94  clients[i].first.service = serviceName[i];
95  if (clients[i].second)
96  {
97  clients[i].second->shutdown();
98  delete clients[i].second;
99  clients[i].second = 0;
100  }
101  clients[i].second = new ros::ServiceClient(nh->serviceClient(clients[i].first));
102  }
103  }
104  }
105  }
106 }
107 }
